page.topic: Configuring Float Above Labels in CSSGrid Containers

description.p: Controls configured to use the *[Float Above]* behavior can be used in a CSSGrid Container but need to be configured to display the label inside the Textbox control. If set to display above the control, the label may disappear when placed inside a CSSGrid Container.
The Float Above behavior is set in the UX Properties. To change the behavior to place the label inside the control instead of above the control,
Open the *[ui:Floating label settings]*, found on the UX Properties pane.
The label will now appear in the layout when you interact with the control.
